testcase.name: test_consistent_naming_pattern

failure.message:
AssertionError: Files don't follow naming convention:
 CITATION-REPLACEMENT-FAILURE-REPORT.md → Should be lowercase: citation-replacement-failure-report.md
 DEEP-CODE-REVIEW-AND-CONTINUATION-PLAN.md → Should be lowercase: deep-code-review-and-continuation-plan.md
 ROOT-CAUSE-ANALYSIS-AND-FIX-PLAN.md → Should be lowercase: root-cause-analysis-and-fix-plan.md
 SYSTEMATIC_FIX_PLAN.md → Should be lowercase: systematic_fix_plan.md
 SYSTEMATIC_FIX_PLAN.md → Use hyphens not underscores: systematic-fix-plan.md
 PHASE3-5-IMPLEMENTATION-REPORT.md → Should be lowercase: phase3-5-implementation-report.md
 AMPERSAND_ISSUE_ANALYSIS.md → Should be lowercase: ampersand_issue_analysis.md
 AMPERSAND_ISSUE_ANALYSIS.md → Use hyphens not underscores: ampersand-issue-analysis.md
 MULTI-HYPOTHESIS-DIAGNOSTIC-PLAN.md → Should be lowercase: multi-hypothesis-diagnostic-plan.md
 .claude/CITATION-QUALITY-ISSUES.md → Should be lowercase: citation-quality-issues.md
 .claude/CITATION-AUDIT-ALL-MANUSCRIPTS.md → Should be lowercase: citation-audit-all-manuscripts.md
 .claude/COMPREHENSIVE-COMPLETION-PLAN.md → Should be lowercase: comprehensive-completion-plan.md
 .claude/MCP-CITATION-QUALITY-PLAN.md → Should be lowercase: mcp-citation-quality-plan.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/fashion_LCA.md → Should be lowercase: fashion_lca.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/fashion_LCA.md → Use hyphens not underscores: fashion-lca.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/mcp_review.md → Use hyphens not underscores: mcp-review.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/fashion_3D_CAD.md → Should be lowercase: fashion_3d_cad.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/fashion_3D_CAD.md → Use hyphens not underscores: fashion-3d-cad.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/fashion_4DGS.md → Should be lowercase: fashion_4dgs.md
 tests/fixtures/golden/manuscripts/fashion_4DGS.md → Use hyphens not underscores: fashion-4dgs.md

Convention: README.md and CLAUDE.md (uppercase), others lowercase-with-hyphens
